articles.title: Amended return may be needed to get full refund on $10,200 unemployment tax break, IRS says - CNBC
articles.description: Americans who collected unemployment benefits last year may need to file an amended tax return in some cases to get their maximum tax refund, the IRS said.
articles.content:
